body_html:
Can it be made explicit:

  • update to a view will update other data structures (one copy of data)
  • update to view will only update data of the data structure (copy on write)

E.g.

  1. I have a sub matrix and perform an update this should be reflected in the larger matrix this is a component of
  2. I update a slice for which I do not want to propagate changes.

body:
Can it be made explicit:

 - update to a view will update other data structures (one copy of data)
 - update to view will only update data of the data structure (copy on write)

E.g. 

1. I have a sub matrix and perform an update this should be reflected in the larger matrix this is a component of
2. I update a slice for which I do not want to propagate changes.
